item.description:
Let's Enjoy the Taste of Hartford at Tisanes!

Tisane Euro-Asian Café
537 Farmington Ave., Hartford
Mytisane.com

Current Menu as of 7/15/10

East Meets West – Your Pick!!

Choice 1: EURO-Menu
• AppetizerHeirloom tomato salad with Gorgonzola, red wine Basil vinaigrette and sweet garlic tuille

• Main Course House made lobster ravioli Succotash with roasted local corn, Vidalia onions and a trio of fresh beans in a herb buerre blanc

• Dessert: Strawberry short Cake ice cream sandwich with sangria strawberries and whipped cream

Choice 2: ASIAN-Menu

• Appetizer: Watermelon Sashimi rolls with pickled vegetables, wakeme (seaweed salad) and a ginger lime vinaigrette

• Main Course: Mongolian BBQ Beef over ginger scallion sticky rice with stir fried snow peas

• Dessert: Caramelized banana Spring rolls with a warm miso butter scotch and coconut dipping sauce

$20.10 per guest
Not inclusive of tax or gratuity
No substitutions
_______________________

Reservations will be needed so please RSVP by 8/1/10. Thanks!

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Taste of Hartford - Europe Meets Asia @ Tisane
